title: 整数反转 (Reverse Integer)
content: 思路: // @Title: 整数反转 (Reverse Integer) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-01-03 10:12:25 // @Runtime: 0 ms // @Memory: 39.7 MB // @comment: // @flag: class Solution { public static int reverse (int x) { if(x==0){ return x; } int result=0; int temp=x; if(x<0){ temp=Math.abs(x); } int t=0; while(temp>0){ result=result*10+temp%10; if (t!=((result-temp%10)/10)){ return 0; } t=result; temp=temp/10; } if(x<0){ result=result*-1; } return result; } } 思路: // @Title: 整数反转 (Reverse Integer) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-04-11 21:12:22 // @Runtime: 0 ms // @Memory: 39.9 MB // @comment: // @flag: class Solution { public int reverse(int x) { int flag = 1; if (x < 0) { flag = -1; x = Math.abs(x); } int result = 0, old = 0; while (x > 0) { int mod = x % 10; result = result * 10 + mod; if ((result - mod) / 10 != old) { return 0; } old = result; x = x / 10; } return flag * result; } }
